mapper.select: select activity_name, activity_address, activity_participation_MAX, activity_participation, activity_Registration_Start_Time, activity_Registration_Deadline, activity_Start_Time, activity_Deadline, activity_credits, activity_content, activity_picture from activity, user, information where user.user_number = #{user.stuNumber} and user.user_id = information.user_id and information.activity_id = activity.activity_id;
